titleStmt.title: Cases of conscience practically resolved containing a decision of the principall cases of conscience of daily concernment and continual use amongst men : very necessary for their information and direction in these evil times / by Jos. Hall.
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.H. and J.G. and are to be sold by Fr. Eglesfield ...,

notesStmt.note: "To the reader" reads: "Higham near Norwich, March 29, 1650."
Running title reads: Divers practicall cases of conscience resolved.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
